Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You wanted to know more about the Purifying Force, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can you tell me?', 3: '5', 4: 'I wanted to know more about you, actually.', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'As you know, the Purifying Force is the task force that specializes in purifying Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Although we do fight Corrupted sometimes, our main duty is to hunt down defected Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...Deserters such as Watanabe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm sure they all have their reasons. But in an army, unity is the most important thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'If we allow Constructs to desert or abandon their missions, any task force could crumble at any second.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'That is why the Purifying Force is established, to prevent that from happening.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I see... I'm sure I've asked you to treat me as a tool.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But if your objective is to better implement me on the battlefield... then I'll comply.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That said, there's not much to know about me. As you're aware, I'm Bianca, one of the team captains of the Purifying Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'My main duty is to hunt down and destroy defected or corrupted Constructs. My specialty is archery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "While I perform well in melee combat, I believe it is a captain's role to know the battlefield inside out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Which is why I picked a bow as my weapon of choice...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "As for the other data regarding my frame, I'm sure you can look them up on the system. I'll save you the lecture.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Are you satisfied with my answer, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "In that case, I think that's enough chitchat for the day. Our job today is to collect military supplies from the Support Force.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Construct', 3: "I-it's the Purifying Force!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Construct', 3: "Hold on, w-we haven't done anything! We're innocent!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What are you talking about?', 3: '27', 4: "Bianca wasn't going to do anything to you.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Support Construct', 3: 'Ahh... Wahhhh!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Don't blame them, Commandant. It's only natural to be scared of the Purifying Force... to be scared of me.", 4: '1'}
